headline: KKR & Co. (KKR) Announces Income from Monetization Activity
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) is one of the High Growth Large Cap Stocks to Buy Right Now. On December 19, KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) announced income from monetization activity in excess of $525 million over the period from October 1, 2025 through December 19, 2025. The company highlighted that quarter-to-date monetization activity comprises […]
